title: Gen Z 2025
description: Empowering the next generation with AI & Big Data, Resilience & Agility, Creative Thinking, Leadership, and Systems Thinking for the future of work.

title: Gen Z 2024
description: Focused on supercharging leadership skills and training based on 4 modules: Speak Up and Pitch Up; Strategic Innovation; Green Skills; and Digital World.

title: Gen Z 2023
description: Focused on cultivating entrepreneurial mindset that supports Zain's 4Sight strategy.

title: Gen Z 2022
description: Geared towards cultivating internal entrepreneurs, innovators, and new thinkers who already possess a mindset capable of supporting Zain's strategic goals.

title: Gen Z 2021
description: Focused on developing digital skills for future data analysts. Addressed the topics of big data, artificial intelligence, and sustainable innovation.

title: Gen Z 2020
description: This cycle incorporated three themes: corporate culture, leadership styles, and future trends.

title: Gen Z 2019
description: Enhancing corporate culture and teamwork when managing projects and events.

title: Gen Z 2018
description: Centered on collaborative project management and creative problem-solving skills.

title: Gen Z 2017
description: Building foundational leadership competencies and strategic thinking capabilities.

title: Gen Z 2016
description: The inaugural program focusing on developing next-generation talent at Zain.

title: Reset
author: Dan Heath
shortDescription: How to Change What's Not Working

popupContent.headline: Transform Your Approach to Change
popupContent.workshopDetails: A comprehensive exploration of Dan Heath's proven frameworks for navigating moments of transition and creating lasting change in both personal and professional contexts.
keyTakeaways: Identify upstream opportunities for meaningful change
Build sustainable habits through environmental design
Create actionable reset strategies for your team

title: Reframe
shortDescription: A learning series empowering colleagues to rethink, reset, and drive meaningful change.

aboutSection.title: About Generation Z
aboutSection.subtitle: A flagship leadership development program by Zain
aboutSection.description: Generation Z is Zain's premier talent development initiative, designed to cultivate future leaders who will drive innovation and transformation across the organization.

pillars.title: AI & Big Data
pillars.description: LLMs & Agentic AI, Analytics & Reporting, Critical Thinking about Data Quality, Security & AI Ethics, and Technological Literacy

pillars.description: Neuroplasticity, Purpose & Fulfillment, Mental Toughness & Coaching

pillars.description: Authentic Leadership, Stakeholder Management, and Influence Without Authority
